Description: We are seeking a highly skilled and experienced Product Development Specialist to join our dynamic team. As a Product Development Specialist, you will play a key role in the conceptualization, design, and development of innovative products that meet our customer's needs and align with our company's strategic goals.You will collaborate closely with cross-functional teams to ensure successful product launches and continuous improvement of existing products.Skills
Skills:
[4-6] years of experience in product development
